refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: imagefilledpolygon creates a filled polygon in image image. points is a PHP array containing the polygon's vertices, i.e. points[0] = x0, points[1] = y0, points[2] = x1, points[3] = y1, etc. num_points is the total number of vertices.

example.title: imagefilledpolygon example
example.programlisting:
<?php

// this example is provided by ecofarm at mullum dot com dot au

// set up array of points for polygon
$values = array(
  0  => 40,    // x1
  1  => 50,    // y1
  2  => 20,    // x2
  3  => 240,   // y2
  4  => 60,    // x3
  5  => 60,    // y3
  6  => 240,   // x4
  7  => 20,    // y4
  8  => 50,    // x5
  9  => 40,    // y5
  10 => 10,    // x6
  11 => 10,    // y6
);

// create image
$im = imagecreate(250, 250);

// some colors
$bg   = imagecolorallocate($im, 255, 255, 255);
$blue = imagecolorallocate($im, 0, 0, 255);

// draw a polygon
imagefilledpolygon($im, $values, 6, $blue );

// flush image
header('Content-type: image/png');
imagepng($im);
imagedestroy($im);

?>
